song_lyrics: Hā re me to joyā chatur Nandlāl re, ūbhā osarīe;
Hā re karyā tilak kesar kerā bhāl re, sundarvar Harie... °ṭek
Hā re joī chhogaliyā chitta lobhe re... ūbhā° 1
Shvet hār paheryā ur par kāju,
Hā re bāndhyā shvet fūlonā bājū re... ūbhā° 2
Hā re joī koṭik kām chhabī lāje re... ūbhā° 3
Hā re chaḍatā ghoḍalḍe vanmāḷī re... ūbhā° 4
title: Hā re me to joyā chatur Nandlāl re

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-763: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
